api_list.api_description: Retrieves all characters with options to sort and limit results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned.

api_list.api_description: Fetch people resources or a specific person.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the person resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter people resources.

query: Can you list the main characters of Final Space? Also, could you tell me more about the character named Luke Skywalker from Star Wars?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves all episodes with options to sort and limit results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned.

api_list.api_description: Fetch film resources or a specific film.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the film resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter film resources.

query: Could you provide me with a list of all episodes of the Final Space series? Additionally, I want to know more about the film 'A New Hope' from Star Wars.

api_list.api_description: Retrieves all locations with options to sort and limit results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned.

api_list.api_description: Fetch planet resources or a specific planet.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the planet resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter planet resources.

query: What are the most significant locations in the Final Space universe? Also, can you give me details about the planet Tatooine in Star Wars?
